_header: Two stones hath it or else it is wrong
_description: ‘A clocke’, a double-entendre riddle — two couplets

CULDd575.Transcription:
Two stones hathe yt or els yt is wrongwith a bald hed & a tag
                    somwhat long& in the night when women lie awakewit ther conscience
                    they doe yt take
CULDd575.Note:
‘A clocke’ written to right. Formerly on a flyleaf of
